property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%> 
        || '::' || "LFA1"."MANDT" 
        || '::' || "LFA1"."LIFNR"                                                        AS "ID",
    "LFA1"."LAND1"                                                                       AS "Country",
    "LFA1"."NAME1"                                                                       AS "Name",
    "LFA1"."ORT01"                                                                       AS "City",
    CASE WHEN NULLIF("LFA1"."VBUND", '') IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                AS "IsInternalVendor",
    CASE WHEN NULLIF("LFA1"."SPERZ", '') IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
    "LFA1"."LIFNR"                                                                       AS "VendorNumber",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "LFA1"."MANDT"                                          AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "LFA1" AS "LFA1"

SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_ID"    AS "ID",
    "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_NAME"                                AS "Name",
	"AP_SUPPLIERS"."SEGMENT1"                                   AS "VendorNumber",
	CASE 
		WHEN COALESCE("AP_SUPPLIERS"."HOLD_ALL_PAYMENTS_FLAG", "AP_SUPPLIERS"."HOLD_FUTURE_PAYMENTS_FLAG") IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE 
		ELSE FALSE 
	END                                                         AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
	CASE 
        WHEN "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'Internal' THEN TRUE 
        ELSE FALSE 
    END                                                         AS "IsInternalVendor",
	"HZ_PARTIES"."CITY"                                         AS "City",
	"HZ_PARTIES"."Country"                                      AS "Country",
	<%=sourceSystem%>                                           AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "AP_SUPPLIERS" AS "AP_SUPPLIERS"
    LEFT JOIN "HZ_PARTIES" AS "HZ_PARTIES"
        ON "HZ_PARTIES"."PARTY_ID" = "AP_SUPPLIERS"."PARTY_ID"

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> ||'::'|| "SupplierPVO"."VendorId"          AS "ID",
    "SupplierPVO"."SupplierTaxPayerCountry"                      AS "Country",
    "SupplierPVO"."PartyPartyName"                               AS "Name",
    NULL                                                         AS "City",
    CASE 
        WHEN "SupplierPVO"."SupplierVendorTypeLookupCode" = 'Internal' 
            THEN TRUE 
       ELSE FALSE 
    END                                                          AS "IsInternalVendor",
    NULL                                                         AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
    CAST("SupplierPVO"."SupplierSegment1" AS VARCHAR(255))       AS "VendorNumber",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                            AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "FscmTopModelAM_PrcPozPublicViewAM_SupplierPVO" AS "SupplierPVO"

SELECT
    ID,
    COUNT(*) AS rc
FROM (

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%>||'::'||VendorsV2.VendorAccountNumber                  AS ID,
    CDSPostalAddressHistoryV2.City                                          AS City,
    CDSPostalAddressHistoryV2.CountryRegionId                               AS Country,
    CASE WHEN VendorsV2.OnHoldStatus IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END                  AS IsBlockedForPayment,
    CASE WHEN VendorsV2.VendorType  IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END                 AS IsInternalVendor,
    VendorsV2.VendorKnownAsName                                             AS Name,
    NULL                                                                    AS SourceSystemInstance,
    VendorsV2.VendorAccountNumber                                           AS VendorNumber
FROM VendorsV2
	LEFT JOIN PartyContactsV3
        ON VendorsV2.VendorPartyNumber = PartyContactsV3.PartyNumber
        AND VendorsV2.AddressLocationId = PartyContactsV3.LocationId
    LEFT JOIN CDSPostalAddressHistoryV2
        ON PartyContactsV3.LocationId = CDSPostalAddressHistoryV2.LocationId


) t
GROUP BY ID
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
order by COUNT(*) desc

SELECT
    -- Unique ID
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "Supplier"."id"                                      AS "ID",
    
    -- Basic Identification
    "Supplier"."name"                                                                 AS "Name",
    "Supplier"."number"                                                               AS "VendorNumber", -- Coupa Supplier Code is the common ERP Vendor Number equivalent
    
    -- Status/Blocking Flags
    CASE 
        WHEN "Supplier"."on-hold" = TRUE THEN TRUE 
        ELSE FALSE 
    END                                                                               AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
    
    -- Internal/External Status
    NULL                                                                              AS "IsInternalVendor",
    
    -- Address (Coupa stores address fields on the Supplier object or site object)
    "supplier"."primary-address_city"                                                 AS "City",
    "Supplier"."primary-address_country"                                              AS "Country",
    
    -- Source System
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                                 AS "SourceSystemInstance",

--Extension Attributes

   "Supplier"."type" AS "Type",
   "Supplier"."risk-level" AS "RiskLevel",
   "Supplier"."business-entity-id" AS "BusinessEntityID",
   "Supplier"."status" AS "Status",
   "Supplier"."commodity_name" AS "CommodityName",
   "Supplier"."enterprise_name" AS "EnterpriseName"

FROM 
    "suppliers" AS "Supplier"
-- Note: Coupa typically includes primary contact/address fields directly on the supplier table 
-- (or a single join to the primary supplier address/site table would be needed). 
-- This simplifies the join that was required for Oracle's party model (HZ_PARTIES).


/*SELECT <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_ID"    AS "ID",
       "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_NAME"                        AS "Name",
	   "AP_SUPPLIERS"."SEGMENT1"                           AS "VendorNumber",
	   CASE 
		   WHEN COALESCE(AP_SUPPLIERS.HOLD_ALL_PAYMENTS_FLAG, AP_SUPPLIERS.HOLD_FUTURE_PAYMENTS_FLAG) IS NOT NULL THEN True 
		   ELSE False 
	   END                                                 AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
	   CASE 
       WHEN "AP_SUPPLIERS"."VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE" = 'Internal' THEN TRUE 
       ELSE FALSE END                                      AS "IsInternalVendor",
	  "HZ_PARTIES"."CITY"                                  AS "City",
	  "HZ_PARTIES"."Country"                               AS "Country",
	   <%=sourceSystem%>                                   AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "AP_SUPPLIERS" AS "AP_SUPPLIERS"
LEFT JOIN "HZ_PARTIES" AS "HZ_PARTIES"
           ON "HZ_PARTIES"."PARTY_ID" = "AP_SUPPLIERS"."PARTY_ID"*/

display_name: Vendor - 00. SAP S/4 HANA Extraction Pool_S4H-HANA

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%> 
        || '::' || "LFA1"."MANDT" 
        || '::' || "LFA1"."LIFNR"                                                        AS "ID",
    "LFA1"."LAND1"                                                                       AS "Country",
    "LFA1"."NAME1"                                                                       AS "Name",
    "LFA1"."ORT01"                                                                       AS "City",
    CASE WHEN NULLIF("LFA1"."VBUND", '') IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                AS "IsInternalVendor",
    CASE WHEN NULLIF("LFA1"."SPERZ", '') IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END                AS "IsBlockedForPayment",
    "LFA1"."LIFNR"                                                                       AS "VendorNumber",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "LFA1"."MANDT"                                          AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "LFA1" AS "LFA1"
